segments.text: Oh man, look at that sink overflowing like crazy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's just standing there, oblivious, drying that stupid plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's splashing everywhere, ruining the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those kids, sneaking cookies behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on that rickety stool, it's gonna collapse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What are they thinking, being so reckless?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's just egging him on, hand stretched out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe no one's noticing the flood on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to yell and stop this nonsense.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a nice garden, but inside it's chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't slip and break something.
segments.speaker: PAR
